definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: belly (NH [[כֶּרֶס]] id.; Aram. [[כַּרְסָא]] karso0 id.; Mand. [[כראס]], [[כארסא]], uterus, Nö:M 151, 157; Ar. kari4un Eth. kr3: wrinkled or folded stomach of cud-chewing animals; cf. Lag:BN 20, 44; As. karšu, body, belly);—only sf. [[כְּרֵשׂוֹ]] Je 51:34 of Nebuchadrezzar under fig. of sea-monster.
